code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{fullItems}from"./constants";import Header from"./components/Header";import Footer from"./components/Footer";import Items from"./components/Items";import Categories from"./components/Categories";import ShowFullItem from"./components/ShowFullItem";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[state,setState]=useState({orders:[],currentItems:fullItems,showFullItem:false,fullItem:null});const deleteOrder=id=>{setState(prevState=>({...prevState,orders:prevState.orders.filter(el=>el.id!==id)}));};const addToOrder=item=>{let isInArray=false;state.orders.forEach(el=>{if(el.id===item.id)isInArray=true;});if(!isInArray)setState(prevState=>({...prevState,orders:[...state.orders,item]}));};const chooseCategory=category=>{if(category==='all'){setState(prevState=>({...prevState,currentItems:fullItems}));return;}setState(prevState=>({...prevState,currentItems:fullItems.filter(el=>el.category===category)}));};const onShowItem=item=>{setState(prevState=>({...prevState,fullItem:item}));setState(prevState=>({...prevState,showFullItem:!state.showFullItem}));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{orders:state.orders,onDelete:deleteOrder}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Categories,{chooseCategory:chooseCategory}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Items,{onShowItem:onShowItem,items:state.currentItems,onAdd:addToOrder}),state.showFullItem&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ShowFullItem,{onAdd:addToOrder,onShowItem:onShowItem,item:state.fullItem}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});};export default App;
